wikipedia_page.main: Richard De Vere (18 June 1967 – 10 March 2014) was a British showman who performed for 21 consecutive seasons at Blackpool Pleasure Beach.

response: * Schnorbitz, St Bernard owned by Bernie Winters, an English comedian and the comic foil of the double act Mike and Bernie Winters with his older brother, Mike. Winters later performed solo, often with the aid of his dog. Following his death, Winters bequeathed Schnorbitz to showman Richard De Vere.
*Richard De Vere, 46, British illusionist (Blackpool Pleasure Beach), pneumonia and heart attack.Bolton illusionist Richard De Vere dies suddenly in Thailand
The show ran until 2006 and featured illusionist Richard De Vere and his canine companion Schnorbitz for many years.
